name: Actor Tycoon 2
storyline: Hollywood -- here we go! Are you ready to take the show business by storm and become the true power behind the curtain, the agent of the best stars of the film industry? Build your own talent agency in Actor Tycoon 2, the actor agent tycoon management/simulation game! Choose to focus on films, theater or TV, build your business from scratch and hire novel actors to guide them to success until you are ready to take on the biggest superstars.
summary: Build your own talent agency in Actor Tycoon 2 and conquer Hollywood in this tycoon/management game! Make stars out of unknown actors, mingle with celebrities, manage your network of connections and win prestigious awards to become the most recognized agent in the film industry!
